org.json

Class ParsePosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.ParsePosition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ParsePosition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents location information for the current location of the Scanner. This is immutable position data, so represents a point-in-time during the scanning process.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ParsePosition(long position, long column, long line, char lastCharacter)
      Create a new ParsePosition with the given location information.

      Get the most recent character parsed by the scanner.

      Get the line position for the location in the parsed stream.
      long getPosition()
      Get the absolute position relative to the start of the parsed stream.
      java.lang.String getPositionDetails()
      Get a String representation of the parse position.
